name: Defend the Peak: A Survival Game Against Climbers
name_original: Defend the Peak: A Survival Game Against Climbers
description:
Please see this version for the non-bugged: https://anonymous-shrimp.itch.io/defend-the-peak-not-bugged

Defend the peak of the mountain from climbers with the use of nature. Use rocks, trees rain or thunder to get the climber's sticky feet off the sacred peak.

This game was made in 72 hours for the ScoreSpace 2020 game jam

Fullscreen is reccomended.

Controls (If you haven't done the tutorial):

Mouse on edge of the screen: Move Camera

Scroll: Zoom

Q, W, E, R: Go to a camera location

Number Key 1: Select rock (Destroy's enemies in radius of placement)

Number Key 2: Select tree (Creates a temporary blockade)

Number Key 3: Select Rainstorm (Temporarily slows down enemies and stops enemy spawning)

Number Key 4: Select Thunderstorm (Destroys all and newly spawned enemies)

Enemy spawn rate is determined by score

Game Designer: Micah Lai 

Sound Designer: Sebastian Whyte
